long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our extension helps people who have trouble staying focused. It blocks access to pre-specified websites for a set amount of time. This allows you to focus on your work without being distracted. In addition to blocking websites, our extension also allows you to adjust the text size and line height on any website you visit, making it easier to read and reducing eye strain.
